item.title: The mystery inside Amazon’s record profits: How much are higher seller fees boosting the bottom line?
item.description: Amazon's cloud and ad divisions are key contributors to its record profit. But the tech giant keeps the full picture murky.

item.title: The number one diet change to lower your cancer risk, according to experts
item.description: Across the board, medical experts want people to prioritize their fiber intake.

item.title: Trump says he’s revoking Biden’s security clearance and ending intelligence briefings in payback move
item.description: The move is the latest in a vengeance tour of Washington that Trump promised during his campaign.

item.title: A judge Trump nominated says he will temporarily block the administration from placing 2,200 USAID workers on paid leave
item.description: U.S. District Judge Carl Nichols sided with two federal employee associations in agreeing to a pause in plans to put the employees on paid leave.

item.title: Trump says he plans reciprocal tariffs, will affect ‘everyone’
item.description: "They charge us. We charge them. It’s the same thing. I seem to be going in that line as opposed to a flat fee, tariff."
